ItemDesc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Normal material used for enhancement.
ItemBGDesc: It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion. The heart is glimmering and the veins on it indicate it's still alive. "What kind of monster is this? Did you see it... Its face! It has the face of our previous leader!"

ItemComefrom.Desc: Certain Fragmentum Monsters at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe
